i have finally made a TUT!!! *w00t* go look and have ago and post it when ya done. 1) make your signature 2) Duplicate base, set to screen 100%. 3) make a new layer and fill with #a12f7a and set to soft light 100% 4) make anothr new layer fill it with #f5e16a and set to darken 100% 5) Duplicate base and put it onto of the two color layers. and press shift,ctrl and u and it will go grey and set that to screen 6) make a new layer and fill it with #232a6f and set that to exclusion 100% 7) Duplicate base and drag it to the top of all the layers and set to soft light 8) make new layer AGAIN and fill it with #000000 and set that to color 41% 9) Put text and brushes or something and your done. *smile* it will look something like this when ya done..well hopefully..
